text: Edmond Jean Forstall was a merchant then banker from New Orleans, Louisiana, from a prominent Louisiana Creole family through his mother, and Irish heritage on his father's side. "Edmond Jean Forstall and Louisiana banking," Irene D Neu, Indiana University, USA, online 27 July 2004.https://thebhc.org/sites/default/files/beh/BEHprint/v014/p0001-p0016.pdf https://ia800208.us.archive.org/10/items/reportofboardofa00east/reportofboardofa00east.pdf == References == Category:1794 births Category:1823 deaths Category:American bankers Category:Businesspeople from New Orleans
title: Edmund Jean Forstall
